headline: Is Block (SQ) Quietly Redefining Its Moat Through Niche Commerce Ecosystems And Bitcoin Payments?
summary: In late January 2026, Square announced that 7 leaves Cafe selected its end-to-end commerce platform, including Square Register, Square Handheld, and Square Loyalty, alongside integrations with Sage Intacct and 7shifts to support operations across 44 U.S. locations. This partnership highlights how Square’s ecosystem is being used to support culturally rooted, mission-driven brands scaling from neighborhood cafes to multi-state operations. We’ll now examine how this expanding ecosystem...
